GCredit gives users a **credit line of up to PHP 50,000** to make purchases online or in-store, in GLife, in GInsure, or pay bills even without enough GCash balance. Interest rates vary based on the userâ€™s GCash activity and payment history. Interest charges apply the day after the purchase.

Here are a few things to know about GCredit:

- No processing fees
- No extra requirements (unless requested by CIMB)
- With interest upon repayment
- Powered by CIMB Bank

Note:

You can keep using your credit line if your payments are on time.
